title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
There is a difference of 68751.0 between the maximum Region Europe and minimum Region Africa India Middle-East.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Number of employees in the y axis.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
There is a difference of 68751.0 between the maximum Region Europe and minimum Region Africa India Middle-East.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Number of employees in each Region on the y axis.
The Number of employees is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
There is a difference of 68751.0 between the maximum Region Europe and minimum Region Africa India Middle-East.
Region Europe is higher than any other Regions with value 70599.0, followed by North America, and Asia (excl. India). Down to Region Africa India Middle-East with the lowest value 1848.0.
The lowest value 1848.0 at Africa India Middle-East is almost 3.01 times smaller than the average value 23482.6.
The Number of employees is 117413.0 if we add up values of all Regions.
